overview: Crown of Fire takes us on a journey into the cloistered world of renowned Benedictine artist, Dunstan Massey, OSB. Through his animated art work and contemplative encounter with a mysterious patriarch from the past, he tells the story of Benedict of Nursia. Benedict became the founder of Western monasticism - but not before overcoming a terrifying ordeal in the desert.
tagline: A journey into a cloistered world, and beyond...
title: Crown of Fire
